channel.title: How do i move the shops?
channel.description: HOW DO I MOVE THE SHOPS I CANT FIGURE IT OUT : (( :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: How do i move the shops?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Denoria, post:5, topic:273847”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=361879.msg2751118#msg2751118 date=1239918229]
Or just find the ID of the NPC.
[/quote]Sorry to go off topic, but are you JcScape owner? never know, its getting the better of me lol,

Thanks,
Denz[/quote]
No, and I do not wish to be either.

item.title: How do i move the shops?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Tommywilson78, post:2, topic:273847”][quote author=lil wayne612 link=topic=361879.msg2751098#msg2751098 date=1239916805]
HOW DO I MOVE THE SHOPS I CANT FIGURE IT OUT : (( :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
[/quote]Go to your npcspawnlist find the shopkeepers name and change the coordinates[/quote]Sorry to post, but actually go to your autospawn.cfg, open it, stand on the shop do ::mypos, and it’ll give you the coords, search those coords in autospawn.cfg, and change them to your new spot,

Hope i helped

Thanks,
Denoria.

Read full topic
